metadata.title: Hydroacoustic/Trawl Survey of the Coastal BC, Canada.

creators.name: Ocean Canada - Pacific Region, Pacific Biological Station

metadata.description:
Catch data consists of Pacific hake.  CTD data available.  Sampling period is during August using 38kHz echosounder / midwater trawl with bottom depth range of 50-1000 m.  

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To study ecosystem dynamics.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually
